sentences.en: A device used to amplify or reshape signals.
sentences.cn: 一种用于信号放大或整形的设备.

sentences.en: As climate change reinforces some trends and counteracts others it will reshape Britain and its landscapes.
sentences.cn: 由于气候变化的某些增强和抵消作用,英国的地形地貌与自然景观都会发生巨大改观.

sentences.en: He has the chance to reshape the Pentagon.
sentences.cn: 现在盖茨拥有了重建五角大楼的机会.
嘿, 请你再理一下你的头发.

sentences.en: How to reestablish the prosperity of the business and reshape enterprise image?
sentences.cn: 如何再现我国旅行社企业的辉煌,重塑旅行社企业形象?

sentences.en: I can absolutely reshape my life!
sentences.cn: 我铁定可以重塑我的生命!

sentences.en: I want to reshape my destiny!
If they succeed, then they will have reshaped the political and economic map of the world.
sentences.cn: 如果他们获得成功，他们将会改变世界的政治和经济格局。

sentences.en: In time , thinks Mr Patel, communications technology will reshape corporate behaviour.
sentences.cn: 帕特尔认为, 通信技术最终将再造公司的行为方式.

sentences.en: Levelers trimmersand temper mills reshape processed stainless steel to meet customers'specifications.
sentences.cn: 轧平机、修边机、冶金工厂将加工后的不锈钢再成形以满足客户的要求.

sentences.en: Through market segmentation, reshape business processes and take the professional road.
sentences.cn: 通过市场细分, 重塑业务流程,走专业化道路.

sentences.en: To RESHAPE the number of elements must not change.
sentences.cn: reshape函数要求变换前后的元素总个数不变,你自己调试一下吧.

sentences.en: Unfortunately, they rarely reshape established processes and hardened attitudes at the speed of change.
sentences.cn: 不幸地是, 他们极少会重塑已经建立好的流程,对待变化速度的态度顽固不化.

sentences.en: Unlike many grand aid initiatives, AMFm does not try to reshape reality beyond the narrow subsidy.
sentences.cn: 与许多重大的援助项目不同, AMFm除了提供有限的补贴之外,不会试图改造现实.

sentences.en: We convert him, and we capture his inner mind ; we reshape him.
sentences.cn: 我们要改造他, 从思想上把他争取过来,让他 脱胎换骨.

sentences.en: We convert him, we capture his inner mind, we reshape him.
sentences.cn: 我们要改造他,争取他的内心, 使他脱胎换骨.

trans.tran_cn: 重塑，给…以新形态，采取新形式，打开新局面
